Reference version 0.1.0

Model inputs

acr2eular

ACR to Eular Conversion

dur.eular.mod dur.eular.good dur.eular.mod.adj dur.eular.good.adj

Survival analysis parameters for therapy duration by Eular response category

eular2haq

HAQ change by 6-month Eular Response

haq.lprog.age

Linear HAQ progression rate differences by age

lifetable.female lifetable.male

US Lifetables 2011

mgmt.cost

Cost of general management of RA

pain

Correlation between HAQ and pain

therapy.pars

Therapy parameters

util.mixture.pars

Mixture model utility mapping

util.wailoo.pars

Wailoo (2006) utility mapping

Generate input data

sample_pats

Sample patients

input_data

Input data for simulation

Sample parameters for PSA

sample_pars

Sample parameters

par_table

Summary of parameters

sample_normal

Sample from normal distributions.

sample_mvnorm

Sample from a multivariate normal distribution

sample_dirichlet

Sample matrices using a Dirichlet distribution

sample_gamma

Sample from gamma distributions

sample_survpars

Sample treatment duration parameters

sample_pars_utility_mixture

Sample parameters for mixture model utility mapping.

Individual patient simulation

sim_haq

Simulate HAQ over time

sim_hc_cost

Simulate health care sector costs from simulated HAQ score

sim_prod_loss

Simulate productivity loss from simulated HAQ score

sim_utility_mixture

Simulate utility from simulated HAQ score (Hernandez-Alva)

sim_utility_wailoo

Simulate utility from simulated HAQ score using Wailoo (2006) model.

sim_qalys

Simulate QALYs

Other useful functions

sim_survtime

Simulate survival time for RA patients
